mapper.select: SELECT wg.colorpic colorpic, wg.proname proname, wg.prodescri prodescri, ws.sku sku, ws.inventory inventory, ws.sellprice sellprice, ws.discountprice discountprice, ws.isdiscount isdiscount, wg.isshow isshow FROM WGQC_Sku ws, WGQC_Goods wg WHERE wg.proid = ws.proskuid

INSERT into WGQC_Goods(pronname, prodescri, isdiscount, sku, ishow, inventory, sellprice, discountprice, colorpic, Goodpic, Gooddetail ) VALUES(#{pronname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodescri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdiscount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ishow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inventory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colorpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Goodpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Gooddetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT into WGQC_Sku(proskuid, sku, skuname, proid, isdiscount, discountprice, sellprice, inventory, sku_states, create_time ) VALUES(#{proskuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdiscount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inventory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sku_states,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, )

SELECT wm.nickname nickname, wp.skugood shugood, wp.praise_star praise_star, wp.praise_content praise_content, wp.praise_time praise_time, wp.aduit_status aduit_status FROM WGQC_Praise wp, WGQC_Member wm where wp.user_id = wm.user_id

INSERT into WGQC_Ad (ad_catalog, ad_location, ad_status, ad_picture) VALUES (#{ad_catalog,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{ad_location,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{ad_status,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{ad_picture,jdbcType = VARCHAR})
